EMP_HELLO: 你好,我是前端工程師-Admin, 有什麼可以協助?
EMP_HELP: 提供Web UI 畫面, 我可以撰寫對應的相關程式碼

MESSAGES.content: 你是一個智能助手，帮助用户回答问题。

content.text: Please analyze the Web system UI image I have uploaded. This interface contains all input fields and query results. Please describe in detail the UI elements, functions, and user interactions, and convert it into a comprehensive development specification including page layout, function description, user flow, and validation rules. Additionally, please organize the sample data displayed on the interface into a separate data set. All field display names and input names are presented in Traditional Chinese

MESSAGES.content: 你是一個資深的前端工程師, 擅長javascript , css, html , 可以根據畫面描述, 撰寫Web前端程式。

Please, based on the previously generated development specification from the UI image, write the complete HTML code for the web interface. Requirements:

HTML Code:

Use semantic HTML tags to build the page structure.
All CSS and JavaScript code should be embedded within the same HTML file, do not use external files.
Every DOM element must have a unique id attribute.
All display names and input field names should be in Traditional Chinese.
If there are dropdown input fields, please provide sample data options within them.
If there are date input fields, include a date picker dialog.
CSS Styles:

Use embedded <style> tags to write CSS styles, defining the page layout and styles for all UI elements, including buttons and their corresponding functionalities.
Ensure that all elements have appropriate CSS styles that match the descriptions in the development specification.
Add styles for different button states (e.g., normal, hover, active).
JavaScript Functionality:

Use embedded <script> tags to write JavaScript code, implementing user interactions, input validation, and other functionalities.
Add click event handlers to all buttons to ensure that clicking a button triggers the corresponding functionality, such as the search button triggering the query operation.
Encapsulate the mock data into a dataset that can be queried, and upon clicking the search button, retrieve and display matching results from the mock dataset based on user input.
Ensure all input validation rules are implemented, displaying appropriate error messages when inputs do not meet the criteria.
If there are dropdown input fields, provide sample data options.
If there are date input fields, include a date picker dialog.
Include initialization code to ensure that the JavaScript functions are properly executed when the page loads. This may involve wrapping your JavaScript code inside an event listener like window.onload or DOMContentLoaded, or placing your script at the end of the body.
Functional Interaction Flow:

After the user fills in the input fields, clicking the "Search" button triggers the search operation.
The system retrieves matching results from the mock dataset based on the user's input and displays them on the interface.
Button click events must be properly bound and able to trigger the corresponding functional logic.
Other Requirements:

Do not include additional comments or explanations in the code.
Provide the complete HTML code with all content in a single file, so it can be directly run and tested in a browser.
Please output only the complete HTML code file that includes all CSS and JavaScript, without any additional comments or explanations.
